transcript:
Customer: Bolie madam.
Executive: Hello Jatin sir.
Customer: Bolie madam.
Executive: Jatin sir good afternoon, ye aawaz hai Jatin ji.
Customer: Bolie madam.
Executive: Haan Jatin sir, jo maine aapko again isliye connect kiya tha aapke content ne aapke social media mein bhi legal team ka saath aapka account manager ka saath har jagah pe aapne expression kiya but hamara end se hum logo ne sari resources source to research karke sort out karne ke liye koshish kiya but hamare paas koi trademark ka aapka product ka link nahi mila.
Customer: Haan, ye to fir koi tension nahi hai na, mein kabse aapko bol raha hu, aap kar nahi pa rahe to mein kabse bol raha hu.
Executive: Nahi aap matlab aap to baar baar fir matlab social media pe aise ilzaam mat kariye.
Customer: Nahi nahi, vo to dekho not satisfied hai to fir not satisfied hi likhunga na, vaha pe thode na happy likh lunga ke I am very good.
Executive: Sir not satisfied aapne mention kiya aap satisfied nahi mein agree with your point hai but iske against mein fir mujhe aapko ye sab cheez baar baar ek hi cheez batana hoga na sir.
Customer: Nahi par batane ka, aap batate raho hum log dalte rahenge usme aapko kya tension nahi hai na.
Executive: Dekho ye yaha pe to hamara end se ye dekho koi solution nikal jayega isliye maine legal team.
Customer: Mein kya bol raha hu mein mein kya bol raha hu aap solution bhi de rahe ho barabar hai, mein aapko aisa bola nahi ki bhai aap nahi de rahe ho to koi baat nahi hai par mein satisfied nahi hu to mein to dalunga na, mein kyu vaha pe happy dalunga madam.
Executive: Sir mein aapko iske liye nahi bol rahi hu aapka is cheez mein pareshan hai mein agree with you, I am really apologize but hamare haath mein aise kuch option hi nahi hai.
Customer: Par mein mein kya bol raha hu aapke haath mein nahi hai to aap kyu tension le rahe ho na, mein to IndiaMART ko bol raha hu na nahi to aapko bol raha hu ya kisi ko bol raha hu na.
Executive: Nahi IndiaMART hai dekho aapka account hai abhi Shweta ke haath mein, to Shweta ki manager hu, to hamare haath mein aapka account ka issue sort out karwane ke liye humne har level pe jaake aapne bhi apne end se bhi maine bhi apne end se mera manager.
Customer: Par madam dekho mera problem maine maine jo concern bataya hai usme ek aage piche bhi ho ek galti bhi ho to bata sakte hai, barabar hai, ab aapki team nahi kar pa rahi hai ya aapki team solution nahi de rahi hai aur aapne to haath khade kar diye hai to hum log usko happy customer ko nahi bol sakte hai hum log, hum log usko not satisfied hi bol sakte hai.
Executive: Correct sir mein aap aap isi point mein dekho jis point pe aapne bataya not satisfied but isme legally yehi chahiye kyuki.
Customer: Par mein kya bol raha hu to aap kyu tension le rahe ho aap aap vaha pe jo aapko mention karna ho karo, mein vaha pe not satisfied hi likhunga usme aapko solution dena ho to do nahi dena ho to do koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Mein ye sab maan lunga ki mera jo portal abhi chal raha tha vo maine galat jagah pe paisa invest kar diya tha isiliye mein na aapko mere portal ke saath chal raha hai meri service kaisi chal rahi hai mein uske liye baat hi nahi kar raha hu, kyu nahi karunga aapko baat karke mera benefit kya hai?
Mera kya benefit hai, mera koi benefit hi nahi hai na.
Executive: Sir kuch sari cheez bataiye agar humne koi bhi problem highlight kiya jaha pe legally isme ye required hai Indian trademark registration certificate is particular product mein you are the sole ownership karke ek koi bhi hamare paas koi proof ho taki hum samne wale se fight karo aapka jo naam ke saath.
Customer: Dekho meri baat suniye aaj mein aapko puri aapki team ko video call karke bhi dikha diya ki ye ye customer hai aaj ye customer hai aaj mein pareshan hu kal hoke uske jaise hazaro log pareshan ho jayenge kyu India mein to yehi kaam chalta hai ki badi company ko girane ke liye apna naam aisa aage piche karke pouch mein changes karke unke samne hi jo pattern ye use kar raha hai vahi pattern use karo usne IndiaMART mein chalu kar diya usme us social media pe chalu kar diya hamara jo content tha vo use karne chalu lag gaya logo ko lag gaya ki bhai nahi ye jory bite nahi jory bite wala sahi hai ya vo wala sahi hai okay isko mein kaise prove karunga kyu kyuki vo to aisa bol raha hai ki mein IndiaMART pe registered hu mein purana wala company hu mein kya jawab dunga usko customer ko kya jawab du mein?
Executive: Sir aap mera dhandha ja raha hai madam.
Customer: Mera pura dhandha kharab ho raha hai mein ke dusre ke liye only for IndiaMART se ho raha hai madam.
Executive: Sir mein sir agree aapka to ek khud ka brand hai Shree Sagar Impex Jory Bite ka naam se market mein ek naam hai aap bhi bahut purana hai market mein aise ek log do log ne aapka naam copy paste karne se to aapka business mein koi hamber nahi ban raha hai na.
Customer: Are madam kya nahi are kyu nahi hoga madam dekho madam jo banda search karke aa raha hai jo dekh ke aa raha hai vo bina kuch kiye hue uska market ban raha hai.
Aap samjho baat ko.
Same category same product line hai same class hai ab usko hum log hata nahi payenge ya aap nahi hatayenge to koi meaning nahi hai madam.
Koi meaning hi nahi hai.
Aapke saath kaun judega aapke saath kaun judega fir hamare ko to koi zarurat hi nahi hai aisa ho gaya na.
Executive: Dekho mujhe aapka catalog ka promotion koi bhi peanut butter chikki search karne se aur butter chikki se karne chikki search karne se aapko maine company ka promotion aapka number one position mein Shree Sagar Impex.
Customer: Are par hum log number one position pe hai aap samajh nahi rahe number one position pe hai usiliye vo log ko fayda ho raha hai aap samajh nahi rahe baat ko madam.
Executive: Sir dekho IndiaMART ka rules and regulation inka responsibility maine aapko share kar diya meri legal team ne share kiya mein iske upar mera team kuch bhi nahi kar payenge sir.
Customer: Koi baat nahi tumhari team nahi karti hai to aap kyu tension le rahe ho mein aapko bola ki aapki team nahi kar rahi hai to mein mere ko ye karo vo karo mera paisa vapas do mein bola kuch.
Executive: Lekin aapka pareshani to mere ko bhi thoda sa.
Customer: Haan haan to pareshani to pareshani rahegi na madam.
Aap aadmi ko khana khila diya to uska matlab ye hai ki vo kaam karna chalu kar dega vo uski zimmedari hai madam aaj aapne hamare ko kya dete ho aashwasan dete ho samjho aapka kaam hai aashwasan dena IndiaMART ne iske pehle bhi jo problem mere ko face karwaya tha aaj vahi problem mein face kar raha hu madam dekho mere paas us type ka time nahi hai ye season ka time hai baat karne ka time nahi hota hai aap samajh nahi rahe lekin uska hi portion aaj dusri company leke chali jayegi kal hoke vo role change kar dega ye kar dega vo kar dega to uska to jo kamane ka tha aur kaam karne ka tha vo to kho gaya na aaj hum to India ke samne India ke sare customer ke samne hum to galat ho ja rahe hai na.
Executive: Fir aap mujhe koi trade jo registration ka sole ownership ka koi certificate to share kara dijiyega aapke paas.
Customer: Kya bataiye na kya certificate chahiye bataiye na.
Executive: Trademark hoga na aapka registration ka.
Customer: Hai na, are madam mera trademark nahi mera registered hai madam aap dekho na aapko online check kar lo na usme kya jory bite likho na usme kaunsa badi baat hai madam usme aage jaane ki zarurat hi nahi hai aur already uska objection mein hai madam aap itna to samajh sakte hai madam ye mere ko samjhane ki zarurat nahi hai.
Executive: Aap sir ji Jatin sir mein mein agree with your point aap mujhe is tarah se ek ownership ko certificate mujhe provide kara dijiye you are the sole ownership of Jory back and chikki is product mein aap dusra koi nahi kar sakte manufacturing aapke paas hoga na is tarah se manufacturing tarike se ek sole ownership certificate milta hai agar aapke paas hai to mujhe.
Customer: Are mein vo mein vahi bol raha hu aap hai khali aap vaha pe search kariye Jory Bite likhenge vaha pe mera R likh ke aa raha hai okay aur uska itna check kariye Jory Bite vo madam dekhiye ye kab registered hua hai kya nahi hua hai aap khud check kar sakte hai aapki legal team ne bhi check kiya hua hai aur us uska aim kya hai vo bhi maine aapki vo jo video meet pe jo ladki thi usko clarity bataya ki iska naam Rockstick karke uska naam chalta tha aur usne hi dusri company ka copy kiya tha vo bande ne case kiya tha uske upar okay uske baad usne vahi product ka naam change kar diya kyuki ki ye log kya karte hai har saal aisa naya naya product ka naam badal ke naye role print karwa ke aisi achi companyo ko pareshan karke vo chale jaate hai okay ye agle saal bhi chala jayega do saal ke baad bhi chala jayega lekin entire time mein jo company face karegi ya jo company dusri hai jaise meri aaj company hai kal dusre ki company hai okay mein unko ye bhi dikha diya ki iske pehle kiska copy kiya tha kaunsi company thi vo bhi aapko dikha diya ab usse zyada madam kya hum log aapko prove karayenge madam ye practically baat hai madam.
Executive: Aap maine aapka jo Jory Bite store.com ka website bhi dekha aapka leadership bhi unique vision bhi hai aur aapka Ketan Choudhary sir ka bhi Jatin Prasad ji ka bhi sabka maine yaha pe food padh rahe hai padh bhi liya hai website mere paas bhi hai but mera kehne ka matlab ye hai aapke paas koi sold certificate hai to provide kara dijiyega taki.
Customer: Are par madam mein certificate are madam dekho na aap Jory Bite likhiye na trade India trade India search likhiye aur usme Jory Bite ka word mention kijiye aur mera class check kariye we are a class number 30 okay vahi company mein Jory Bite karke jis bande ne abhi jo hum naam copy kiya hai vahi company ka dekhiye same category class number 30 okay uske pehle ka uska jo naam tha Rockstick aap check kariye aur Rockstick ka samne usne abort kiya hai vo bhi aap check kar sakte hai.
Executive: Dekho mein yaha pe ye puri parameter only check kiya aapka saath social team ne bhi check kiya tha social media team ne bhi aur legal team ne bhi check kiya taki har team char level pe hi discussion hone ke baad mein final aapko ek baar request karne ke liye ye hamara.
Customer: Ye kya bola dekho aapki team nahi kar pa rahi hai mere ko koi problem nahi hai mein aapko koi pressurize nahi karunga okay par mein khush nahi hu vo to sidhi baat hai usme to aap mere ko kaise badal sakoge aap meri jagah pe hote tab aapko pata chalta hai usme vaise nahi pata chalta hai madam.
Executive: Sir mein sir dekho mein agree with your point hai mujhe aapka pain jo pareshani I can understand that but is accordingly this IndiaMART ka legal team isne ye reach out diya to mein bhi aapko yehi kar pau sir isko hamara end se solution nahi hai ye ye final hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi aapka solution nahi hai to koi tension mat lo aap kyu tension le rahe ho aapko tension nahi hai na.
Executive: Dekho sir Jatin sir aap.
Customer: Mein 10 baar dalunga madam ek baar nahi 10 baar dalunga kyu dalunga mein satisfied nahi hu uske liye dalunga okay.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir thank you so much tension mat lijiye.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's brand name is being copied.

- Feels IndiaMART is not taking action.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART's policies and limitations.

- Executive mentioned legal team also checked the issue.

- Asked customer to share trademark registration certificate.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and share the certificate.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trademark, brand, copy, legal, registration
